comments.author: digitarald
comments.message: I don't see the reason to use $$ for querying one Element with his ID when there is $ to get an Element by ID.

comments.author: kangax
comments.message:
Zach,

$$( *[id="myForm:Foo"] ) works just fine in Prototype

some tests can be found at http://yura.thinkweb2.com/s...

(results are printed into firebug console)

I understand it looks more like a hack but at least it's possible :)

Cheers,
Juriy

comments.author: John Resig
comments.message: Glad to hear that the character escaping is of use to you guys - it was oft-requested, so I put some effort into getting it in the latest release; I didn't realize just how important it could be!

comments.author: Giuseppe
comments.message: Through this article I could write a library of components for jsf based on jQuery. Thank you very much
